about_the_game:
GENERAL


Monster is a clicker game and you click a monster. After a few clicks you will get more monsters. The epic monsters are waiting for you. Do you want to catch them?

GAMEPLAY


You will just simply click the monster.

  • After 30 minutes you will get random Common-Uncommon monsters.
  • After 3 hours you will get random Special-Rare-Epic monsters.
  • After 18 hours you will get random Mythic-Legendary monsters.

All you need to do is click the monster and wait. We wish you a good luck for you in this journey.
